__comments.voice: Controls the voice output mode for the brewing system (e.g., 'normal' or 'sexy').
__comments.REG starting temperature BK: Initial temperature at which the heating process for the Boil Kettle (BK) starts (in 째C or 째F).
__comments.REG starting temperature HLT: Initial temperature at which the heating process for the Hot Liquor Tank (HLT) starts (in 째C or 째F).
__comments.starting efficiency BK: Initial heating efficiency (0-100%) for the Boil Kettle (BK) when heating starts.
__comments.starting efficiency HLT: Initial heating efficiency (0-100%) for the Hot Liquor Tank (HLT) when heating starts.
__comments.starting efficiency P1: Initial operational efficiency (0-100%) of Pump 1 when it starts.
__comments.starting efficiency P2: Initial operational efficiency (0-100%) of Pump 2 when it starts.
__comments.near_target_heating_efficiency: Efficiency level (0-100%) of the heating elements as they approach the target temperature to minimize overshooting.
